DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this pilot study is to determine if Topical Oral Wound Emulsion (TOWE) assists with dental wound healing and relieves pain from oral wounds.
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study to Evaluate the Use of OroScience Topical Oral Wound Emulsion in Post Operative Wound Healing
DOC.criteria: Planned dental treatment includes intraoral surgery involving full thickness mucoperiosteal flaps with at least one vertical releasing incision Complicated medical history History of poor patient compliance Presence or placement of materials beneath the suture site
DOC.keyword: oral periodontal gingival intraoral mucosal mucoperiosteal
